On August 26, 2025, Bajaj Finserv Ltd. announced the incorporation of a new step-down subsidiary, Bajaj Technology Services Inc . The company also announced the incorporation of a wholly-owned subsidiary on the same day.

In other news, Jefferies initiated coverage on Bajaj Finserv on August 21, 2025, with a 'buy' rating and a target price of Rs 2,420. The brokerage forecasts a 22% core earnings CAGR over FY25â€“28, citing strong growth at Bajaj Finance and improving profitability in BAGIC and BALIC.
